remarks: If the topology component is already correctly truncated, then it forms a topological space (with the topology extractor function coming out the same as the component).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
statement:
tsettps.a $e |- A = ( Base ` K ) $.
tsettps.j $e |- J = ( TopSet ` K ) $.
tsettps $p |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` A ) -> K e. TopSp ) $.
